content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which location showed an annual average grain yield in 1991–1993 that was approximately <math alttext="2.3" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>2.3</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> times the yield in 1961–1963?

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
